articles.title: Citroen begins exports from Kamarajar Port Ltd - The Economic Times
articles.description: In February, Citroen, which is a part of Stellantis Group, inked a pact with Kamarajar Port, which is located 24 km north of Chennai Port in the city, for shipping out vehicles to the overseas market.
